snippet: The research was partly supported by a more than $1 billion program that aims to eventually reconstruct the human brain in a computer.
abstract: Research program partly supported by Human Brain Project publishes study in journal Cell reporting reconstruction of partial rat brain in computer, and outlines plan to attempt same with human brain; neuroscientists have been skeptical, with some signing letter criticizing project, and others withholding judgment until fully absorbing report, one of the longest ever published in field of neuroscience.
lead_paragraph: The research was partly supported by a more than $1 billion program that aims to eventually reconstruct the human brain in a computer.

headline.print_headline: Part of Rat Brain Is Recreated in a Computer, Researchers Say
headline.main: Researchers Say They’ve Recreated Part of a Rat Brain Digitally
